summary: During the war between Iran and Iraq, a group of Iranian Kurd musicians set off on an almost impossible mission. They will try to find Hanareh, a singer with a magic voice who crossed the ... See full summary »
cast: Shahab Ebrahimi|Faegh Mohamadi|Allah-Morad Rashtian|Rojan Hosseini|Saeed Mohammadi|Iran Ghobadi|Mariam Pouyani|Hossein Rashid-Ghamat|Fathollah Sa'edi|Bahram Sarbazi
title: Gomgashtei dar Aragh
